::Hot Rod::

He follows the IGL staff without asking questions. He figured he was
getting in trouble for killing Dragonfly, but he had no choice.
Dragonfly had been coming at him with leathal force, and had stated that
he was fighting to the death.

OOC: Wow, the RPG got busy today.
